name: Iron Falls
description: Rich in the aetheric power of terra, the resource-laden island of Iron Falls would almost be idyllic if not for the terra-craving Behemoths often found here. Before these dangers were realized, unknown miners made at least one attempt to establish a permanent operation here, but their story - as well as their identities - appear lost to history.

island_events.name: Aether Surge
island_events.description: Aether surges are a common occurrence across the Hunting Grounds, attracting powerful Behemoths and other hostile creatures.

island_events.name: Shatterstorm
island_events.description: Tough Behemoths with thick hides swarm together. Shatter crystals to increase your attack speed.

journal_entries.name: Zephyr Strike Banner
journal_entries.description: This banner bears the striking iconography of the Ostian commando team Zephyr Strike. It appears these intrepid military Slayers have executed missions even here, on the far side of the Ram formation.
